Name: Het Monumentje
Review Text: Great local bar, great prices on drinks and friendly staff. Would definitely recommend to anyone visiting the Jordaan neighborhood of Amsterdam!

Name: Het Monumentje
Review Text: old amsterdam pub and cafe, not much room inside or outside, this place has friendly atmosphere and is indeed a monument in itself.

Name: Het Monumentje
Review Text: Wonderful place, perfect for a quick stop. The girl working at the bar is lovely and she makes a great coffee.

Name: Het Monumentje
Review Text: Amsterdam cafe at its finest. A true gem, if you are a tourist visiting  have a peek and a beer and be on your way, keep your footprint to a minimum. Respect the local folklore, its inhabitants and the liberal tolerant atmosphere here... love to all!

Name: Het Monumentje
Review Text: Great little bar serving well into the night. Local craft beer, selection of Belgian beers and Paulaner on tap. No music requests but hey playlist was great. Highly recommend for catching up with mates.

Name: Het Monumentje
Review Text: Brown bar vibes with a friendly service

Name: Het Monumentje
Review Text: My friends and I are expats living in amsterdam and we were treated so badly when we arrived. Such rude service and not the usual friendly environment one would expect from a brown cafe in Amsterdam. Not worth the visit, go across the street instead to De Blaffende Vis for an excellent experience!

Name: Het Monumentje
Review Text: The original Amsterdam caf√©. Do not miss, treat with respect and love!  Monumentje is the most special place in Amsterdam. The crowds, the ambient, the no-phone rule, the backgammon culture...just let go and enjoy

Name: Het Monumentje
Review Text: Greatest bar in jordaan. Beers, hot chocolate and the ladys behind the bar.

Name: Het Monumentje
Review Text: Monumentje is a small bar, where you just jump in to have a good beer surrounded by locals. Friendly service and classic interior.

Name: Het Monumentje
Review Text: Great evening had here we were lucky enough to be there on one of their music evenings and a brilliant band were playing. Good choices of beer nice wine great atmosphere and a beautiful location.

Name: Het Monumentje
Review Text: Freezing outside - We politely asked the man behind the bar if we could close the curtain at the entrance and got a sarcastically rude answer back. 1 star is a compliment.

Name: Het Monumentje
Review Text: Best place ever for a local beer and a good, relaxed time in an old typically Dutch neighborhood bar.

Name: Het Monumentje
Review Text: Excellent beer,  wonderful staff and good music.  One of the best brown cafes in Amsterdam.

Name: Het Monumentje
Review Text: Excellent atmosphere, little or no tourists. The owner Eri was very helpful and made us taste exquisite beers

Name: Het Monumentje
Review Text: Typical Dutch "brown bar". Small with a nice atmosphere. Board games are played here.

Name: Het Monumentje
Review Text: A locals old school place. Don't play tourist there. And definitely avoid if you're a millenial

Name: Het Monumentje
Review Text: Great little pub for quiet drink.  Cheap prices and full  of locals sitting outside or inside.

Name: Het Monumentje
Review Text: Do not recommend for a cappuccino. Perhaps the worst espresso we had in Amsterdam.

Name: Het Monumentje
